thread.title: New Jersey Devils Jordin Tootoo fined for trip vs. Nashville
thread.title_full: New Jersey Devils Jordin Tootoo fined for trip vs. Nashville

author: wtopstaff
title: New Jersey Devils Jordin Tootoo fined for trip vs. Nashville
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » New Jersey Devils Jordin… New Jersey Devils Jordin Tootoo fined for trip vs. Nashville By The Associated Press October 15, 2015 2:00 pm 
NEW YORK (AP) — Jordin Tootoo of the New Jersey Devils has been fined more than $2,200 for a dangerous trip in a game against the Nashville Predators. 
Tootoo tripped defenseman Seth Jones in the third period and was assessed a minor penalty in Tuesday night’s game in New Jersey. 
The fine was announced Thursday by the NHL and was the maximum allowed under the collective bargaining agreement. The money goes to the players’ emergency assistance fund. Topics:
